description: A shell script for managing time synchronization with a peer device, including initialization, starting, stopping, scheduling via cron, and handling ntp time sync events.

methods.name: do_time_sync_with_peer
methods.description: Performs periodic checks and notifies the peer device for time synchronization based on system time.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Initiates the time sync process by calling do_time_sync_with_peer.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the service by updating sysevent status.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Sets up periodic cron jobs for the service.
